form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Roberts (for himself, Mr. Tester, Mr. Coats, Mr. Cochran, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Moran, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Thune, Mrs. Fischer, Mr. Daines, Mr. Inhofe, Mr. Wicker, Mr. Hoeven, Ms. Murkowski, Ms. Heitkamp, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Merkley, and Ms. Klobuchar) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the 96-hour physician certification requirement for inpatient critical access hospital services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Critical Access Hospital Relief Act of 2015.

section.header: Removing Medicare 96-hour physician certification requirement for inpatient critical access hospital services
